C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: generate-genesis
args:
apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl jq
curl -LO https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/$(curl -s https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/stable.txt)/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl && chmod +x ./kubectl

echo "Creating config ..."
/opt/besu/bin/besu operator generate-blockchain-config --config-file=/raw-config/raw-config-genesis.json --to=/generated-config
echo "Creating genesis configmap in k8s ..."
./kubectl create configmap --namespace default sumo-besu-genesis-genesis --from-file=genesis.json=/generated-config/genesis.json

# create the static-nodes with proper dns names for the quorum nodes
echo "[" > /generated-config/static-nodes.json

echo "Creating validator secrets in k8s ..."
i=1
for f in /generated-config/keys/*; do
  if [ -d ${f} ]; then
    echo $f
    # the public key has an extra '0x' in front which isn't accepted by the enode format, this strips that out
    sed 's/^0x//' ${f}/key.pub > ${f}/enode
    ./kubectl create secret generic besu-node-validator-${i}-keys --namespace default --from-file=private.key=${f}/key.priv --from-file=public.key=${f}/key.pub --from-file=enode=${f}/enode

    # add to the static-nodes
    pubkey=$(cat ${f}/enode )
    echo ",\"enode://$pubkey@besu-node-validator-$i-0.besu-node-validator-$i.default.svc.cluster.local:30303?discport=0\"" >> /generated-config/static-nodes.json

    i=$((i+1))
  fi
done

echo "Creating bootnode keys ..."
for j in {1..2}
do
  /opt/besu/bin/besu public-key export --to=public${j}.key
  # the public key has an extra '0x' in front which isn't accepted by the enode format, this strips that out
  sed 's/^0x//' ./public${j}.key > /tmp/enode${j}
  echo "Creating bootnode ${j} secrets in k8s ..."
  ./kubectl create secret generic besu-node-bootnode-${j}-keys --namespace default --from-file=private.key=/opt/besu/key --from-file=public.key=./public${j}.key --from-file=enode=/tmp/enode${j}

  # add to the static-nodes
  pubkey=$(cat /tmp/enode${j} )
  echo ",\"enode://$pubkey@besu-node-bootnode-$j-0.besu-node-bootnode-$j.default.svc.cluster.local:30303?discport=0\"" >> /generated-config/static-nodes.json

  rm ./public${j}.key ./enode${j}.key /opt/besu/key
done

echo "]" >> /generated-config/static-nodes.json
# remove the extra comma to make it valid json
sed -i '0,/,/s///' /generated-config/static-nodes.json
./kubectl create configmap --namespace default sumo-besu-genesis-enodes  --from-file=static-nodes.json=/generated-config/static-nodes.json

echo "Completed ..."

containers.name: delete-genesis
args:
apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl
curl -LO https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/$(curl -s https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/stable.txt)/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl && chmod +x ./kubectl
echo "Deleting genesis configmap in k8s ..."
./kubectl delete configmap --namespace default sumo-besu-genesis-genesis
echo "Deleting validator secrets in k8s ..."
for f in `seq 1 4`; do
  echo $f
  ./kubectl delete secret besu-node-validator-${f}-keys --namespace default
done
echo "Deleting bootnode secrets in k8s ..."
for j in {1..2}
do
  ./kubectl delete secret besu-node-bootnode-${j}-keys --namespace default
done

echo "Deleting node-enodes configmap in k8s ..."
./kubectl delete configmap --namespace default sumo-besu-genesis-enodes

echo "Completed ..."

controls.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
Prevent containers from allowing command execution
